spellcasting.name: Lancer des sorts
headerEntries: Doric casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (save against spells {@dc 15}):

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Doric performs two Shaped Claw or Slingshot attacks. She can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

action.name: Griffe en forme
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, 5-foot range, a target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fronde
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 feet, a target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Changement de forme (5/Jour)
entries: Doric magically transforms into a beast with a challenge value of 3 or less, or into an owl bear (see Monster Manual).

Doric can remain in this form for up to 2 hours. She can choose whether her equipment falls to the ground, melts into her new form or is carried by the new form. Doric returns to her true form if she is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. She can return to her true form using a bonus action.

When Doric is transformed, his stat block is replaced by the stat block of this form, except that he retains his current hit points, maximum hit points, this action bonus, his alignment and his Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma scores.

reaction.name: Réplique féroce (3/Jour)
entries: When Doric is wounded by a creature she can see within 60 feet, she magically engulfs the creature in flames. The creature must make a saving throw of {@dc 15} Dexterity, suffering 16 ({@damage 3d10}) points of fire damage on failure, or half as much damage on success.

spellcasting.name: Lancer des sorts
headerEntries: Edgin casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as a spellcasting ability (save against spells {@dc 15}):

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Edgin performs two reinforced lute or short sword attacks.

action.name: Luth renforcé
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, 5-foot range, a target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Épée courte
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 5 feet, a target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Des mots qui désorientent
entries: Edgin magically taunts up to three creatures he can see within 60 feet of him. Each creature must pass a Wisdom saving throw {@dc 15} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of Edgin's next turn.

reaction.name: Mots inspirants (3/jour)
entries: When a creature that Edgin can see within 60 feet fails an ability test, attack roll or saving throw, Edgin gives it a magical boost. The creature can make a {@dice d8} roll and add the resulting number to the total, potentially turning the failure into a success.

trait.name: Charme désarmant
entries: If Forge is not wearing armor, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Double-Cross
entries: If Forge hits a friendly creature with an attack roll, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

trait.name: Escape
entries: If Forge suffers an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he takes no damage if he succeeds in his saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he is not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Forge performs two dagger attacks, two heavy crossbow attacks, or one of each.

action.name: Dague
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 feet or range 20/60 feet, a target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Arbalète lourde
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 feet, a target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage. Hit or miss: if the target is a creature, it has a disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the next Forge turn.

bonus.name: La ruse
entries: Forge takes the Dash, Disengage or Hide action, or gives itself the advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

reaction.name: Esquive étrange
entries: Forge halves the damage he suffers when hit by an attack. He must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Sans état d'âme
entries: At the start of her turn, Holga can gain advantage on attack rolls with a melee weapon during that turn, but attack rolls against her have advantage until the start of her next turn.

trait.name: Équipements spéciaux
entries: Holga carries a large, dark steel axe, a magical weapon that gives her resistance to lightning damage for as long as she carries it (see above).

trait.name: Défense non blindée
entries: If Holga is not wearing armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Holga performs three Darksteel Great Axe or Improvised Weapon attacks, in any combination.

action.name: Grande hache en acier foncé
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, 5-foot range, a target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slicing damage.

action.name: Arme improvisée
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, 5-foot range or 20/60-foot range, a target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Lutte
entries: Holga pushes a creature within 5 feet of her. This creature must pass a Strength saving throw {@dc 15} or be moved three feet into an unoccupied space of Holga's choice.

spellcasting.name: Lancer des sorts
headerEntries: Roll one {@dice d6}. On a result of 1, Simon must roll on the wild magic surge table in the Player's Handbook. On a roll of 2 or more, Simon casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as his spellcasting ability (save against spells {@dc 14}):
will: {@spell speak with dead} (Simon must be holding his deathly token to cast this spell)

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Simon has advantage on saving throws he makes to avoid or end the condition {@condition charmed} over himself, and magic cannot put him to sleep.

trait.name: Équipements spéciaux
entries: Simon carries a bag of grips, two pairs of sending stones and a lethal token (see Spellcasting).

trait.name: Magie sauvage
entries: When Simon takes 20 or more points of damage from a single source, or suffers a critical hit, he must roll on the Wild Magic Surge table in the Player's Handbook.

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Simon performs three attacks with either Poignard d'estoc or Boulon du Chaos. He can replace an attack by using the incantation.

action.name: Bâton
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, 5-foot range, a target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage.

action.name: Éclair de chaos
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 feet, a target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) damage of a random type determined by a roll of {@dice d8}: 1, acid; 2, cold; 3, fire; 4, strength; 5, lightning; 6, poison; 7, psychic; 8, thunder.

reaction.name: Bouclier protecteur (3/Jour)
entries: When Simon or any other creature he can see within a 3-meter radius of him is in danger of taking damage, he conjures up a 3-meter-radius sphere of shimmering magical force centered on him. Creatures inside the sphere have resistance to the damage that triggered this reaction.

spellcasting.name: Lancer des sorts
headerEntries: Sofina casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (save against spells {@dc 18}):

trait.name: Équipements spéciaux
entries: Sofina wears a magical dress that gives her a +2 bonus to AC and a +1 bonus to saving throws (included above).

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Sofina performs three Necrotic Strike attacks.

action.name: Frappe nécrotique
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 5 feet or range 120 feet, a target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Essaim de météores (1/Jour)
entries: Sofina magically unleashes a swarm of meteorites that explode into four 40-foot-radius spheres, each centered on a point she can see within a mile of her. These spheres can overlap. Each creature inside one or more of these spheres must make a Dexterity saving throw {@dc 18}, suffering 35 ({@damage 10d6}) points of fire damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) points of bludgeoning damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful saving throw. A creature located in several spheres suffers this damage only once.

bonus.name: Invocation d'un Wraith (1/Jour)
entries: Sofina magically summons the spirit of a Thayan assassin, who appears as a specter (see Monster Manual). The summoned specter appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Sofina, whom it obeys. The summoned specter takes its turn immediately after Sofina. It lasts for 1 hour, until it dies, until Sofina dies or until Sofina eliminates it with a bonus action.

trait.name: Aura de protection
entries: Xenk and his allies within 3 meters of him have the advantage on saving throws.

action.name: Multi-attaques
entries: Xenk performs three Daggersword attacks and uses Daggersword Flourish. He can replace Dagger Arrow with Purifying Touch if available.

action.name: Daggersword
entries: Choose the attack that corresponds to the sword's current shape (see Sword offset below):

action.name: Épée longue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit a target at a range of 5 feet. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) radiating damage.

action.name: Épée courte et poignard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 5 feet, a target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) radiant damage.

action.name: Flamboiement de l'épée de dague
entries: Choose the option that corresponds to the dagger's current shape (see Moving the dagger below):

action.name: Épée longue
entries: Xenk magically detaches the longsword blade from its hilt and hurls it at any creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw {@dc 16}. On a failed save, the target is impaled by the blade, suffering 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) points of piercing damage, and is stunned {@condition prone}. At the end of the current round, the blade magically reattaches to its hilt.

action.name: Épée courte et poignard
entries: Xenk strikes with both weapons. Any creature within 3 meters of him must make a Dexterity roll {@dc 16}. On a failed save, the creature suffers 7 ({@damage 2d6}) points of piercing damage and is at a disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of Xenk's next turn. On a successful save, the creature suffers half as much damage and no further effects.

action.name: Toucher purificateur (1/Jour)
entries: Xenk hits a creature within 5 feet of him. The target magically regains 27 ({@dice 6d8}) hit points and benefits from a spell {@spell lesser restoration}.

bonus.name: Déplacement de l'épée de dague
entries: Xenk changes the shape of his sword-dagger, choosing one of the following forms: a long sword, or a short sword in one hand and a dagger in the other.
